bibl.title: Ten Christian Papyri in the Columbia Collection.
bibl.note: P. Col. Teeter 1-10. Diss. Columbia Univ. Summary in DA 50 (1989-1990) p. 3329-A. - 1. The Lord's Prayer (Matthew 6:4-6,8-12). - 2. "Private" litany and portion of Psalm 150. - 3. Homily on the Epiphany. - 4. Byzantine hymn. - 5. List of axles. - 6-10. Letters.
Teeter Timothy Mitchell, Ten Christian Papyri in the Columbia Collection.
